IPDR_tag_ConnectionHandlers Struct Reference

#include <Transport.h>

void(* Connect )(Connection C, IPDR_IPAddress Addr, unsigned short Port, void *Arg)

void(* Data )(Connection C, BufferHandle *BH, unsigned int MessageLength, void *Arg)

Detailed Description

The connection handlers structure is used to receive notifications in cases of a connection, disconnection and arrival of data.
